entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Kamsack
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.3°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 12:07 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 12:07 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 12:07 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
